name: Iron Ingot
desc: A basic element that stopped the pulsing heart of a giant star. Used for providing hardness and strength to weapons and armor.

name: Platinum Ingot
desc: A basic element forged from the neutron furnace of supernovae, used as a means of adding flexibility in many types of weapons and armor.

name: Steel Ingot
desc: A forged metal consisting of a mix of other metals. Imparts strength and corrosion resistance to armor and weapons.

name: Orichalcum Ingot
desc: A basic element forged in the hearts and minds of fantasy authors. Imparts glitz and shinyness to weapons and armor.
